com.ikalagaming.logging

Class PackageLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikalagaming.logging.PackageLogger

  • public class PackageLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a reference to the logger package used to log info for a particular package.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PackageLogger(Package logged)
      Constructs a new logger for the given package.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PackageLogger

        public PackageLogger(Package logged)
        Constructs a new logger for the given package. This logger logs messages using the package name.
        Parameters:
        logged - the package to log messages for

    • Method Detail

      • logError

        public void logError(java.lang.String error,
                     LoggingLevel level,
                     java.lang.String details)
        This should not be called directly. Use PackageLogger to log errors.
        Logs the provided error. Attempts to use localized names for the error code and logging level. This only logs errors that are above or equal to the threshold. The package name is listed before the info.
        Parameters:
        error - The error that occurred
        level - what level is the requested log
        details - additional information about the error

      • log

        public void log(LoggingLevel level,
                java.lang.String details)
        This should not be called directly. Use PackageLogger to log info.
        Logs the provided error. Attempts to use localized names for the logging level. This only logs information that is above or equal to the logging threshold.
        Parameters:
        level - what level is the requested log
        details - what to log
